reviews.review: mto bom.. pena que a dev abandonou

This game can be a fun past time or hobby with a fairly high ceiling for skill while not being impossible to digest and understand.

Or, it can be the reason you need a hobby or pass time to vent after taking it too seriously.

It's fun, but not a game that is polished enough to play seriously for rank ect. Hitboxes can be weird, lag happens, and some things just dont work, or work in really weird ways. Don't take it super seriously and handshake that you'll have bad games where you get tunneled or are facing a lobby of a fully decked out survive with friends on comms and overall i think most people can enjoy it.
very fun, until you play against Wraith

Я новичок в этой игре, почти нуб, но тем не менее знаний о ней у меня, как собак, потому что в своё время насмотрелся на ютубе по самые не-балуй. Во многих отзывах ДБД обзывают помойкой, и в принципе, эти люди правы, потому что один режим уже 5 лет, оптимизация, как ###### ##### и куча багов. Но всё же ДБД по своему гениальная. А гениальность её в том, что уже 5 лет с одним режимом она не только держит аудиторию, но и набирает её, а ещё находится в трендах стима. (кста, раньше игра была атмосферней) Покупать её - это ваш выбор, но я бы посоветовал. Удачи, и не надо меня хейтить за хорошее отношение к ДБД, пожалуйста.
Все было хорошо пока не сгорела мать в туннеле.
Круто, но, если бы не было слишком много ливаков, то было-бы еще лучше, я даже на баги плюю, лишь бы не было баго-юзеров со всякими дебилами.
Кто любит получать по ебалу из воздуха, игра для вас, смело скачивайте.
THIS GAME IS TRASH AND SUCKS ASS

spent more money on buying new underwear than what i spent on this game

the game has a lot to offer for both casual players and hardcore players alike to really dive in and have fun with either survive with friends or playing as a killer and really mastering each killer and getting good at the game, there are a lot of little things that really show your skill as a player on both sides such as how well you can "loop" killers as a survivor and little mind games you can play to throw each other off and create distance in a chase or make up for the distance lost, all the killers feel different and have a wide range of skill floors and ceilings allowing people to pick up a easier killer and later transition on to others later. The perks in this game are great and you can teach any survivor/killers perks to other killers or survivors once you get them to a certain level. the game is constantly updated with new original killers as well as ones from beloved franchises such as Resident Evil, Halloween, Nightmare on Elm street, Leatherface, Left 4 Dead and strangers things and as of today from the hellraiser franchise Pinhead or "The Cenobite". Overall the game is a great time if you like horror games and offers a unique 1v4/4v1 gameplay style that very few other titles have or accomplished as well as this game BeHavior did a fantastic job and im excited for the stuff they have planned in the future
